<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">d31c25c347f23110274adeae536d4370</macroponent><name>dropdown_1/items</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    //console.log(api.data.get_customer_updates_1.output.data.GlideRecord_Query.sys_update_xml._results);
    return api.data.get_customer_updates_1.output.data.GlideRecord_Query.sys_update_xml._results.map((item) => {
        return {
            'id': item.name.value,
            'label': item.type.value
        };
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-16 15:30:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>1518149347433110274adeae536d43a4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>dropdown_1/items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Application Explorer" source="x_13258_applicat_0">52fee90207db61102b80fe4f7c1ed041</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Application Explorer">52fee90207db61102b80fe4f7c1ed041</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1518149347433110274adeae536d43a4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-16 15:45:27</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
